name: Z
text: If this Character battles with a (Strike) attribute Character, this Character gains +3000 Power during this turn. Activate: Main — Once Per Turn — DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): This Character gains +2000 Power during this turn.

effect.text: If battling a Strike Character, gain +3000 Power this turn.
